messages.content: Show me the top 10 customers by credit limit.
SELECT name, "creditLimit" FROM "Customer" ORDER BY "creditLimit" DESC NULLS LAST LIMIT 10;
List all sales orders created today.
SELECT * FROM "SalesOrder" WHERE "createdAt" >= CURRENT_DATE;
Count the number of sales orders by status.
SELECT status, COUNT(*) FROM "SalesOrder" GROUP BY status;
Which machines are currently under maintenance?
SELECT name, code FROM "Machine" WHERE status = 'MAINTENANCE';
Total production quantity for order WO-12345.
SELECT SUM("quantityProduced") FROM "ProductionExecution" WHERE "productionOrderId" = (SELECT id FROM "ProductionOrder" WHERE "orderNumber" = 'WO-12345');
Show me all unpaid sales invoices.
SELECT "invoiceNumber", "totalAmount", "paidAmount" FROM "Invoice" WHERE status = 'UNPAID';
List items in the Raw Material warehouse with low stock (less than 100).
SELECT pv.name, i.quantity FROM "Inventory" i JOIN "ProductVariant" pv ON i."productVariantId" = pv.id JOIN "Location" l ON i."locationId" = l.id WHERE l.slug = 'rm_warehouse' AND i.quantity < 100;
What is the total revenue this month?
SELECT SUM("totalAmount") FROM "SalesOrder" WHERE "orderDate" >= date_trunc('month', CURRENT_DATE) AND status NOT IN ('DRAFT', 'CANCELLED');
How many production orders are in progress?
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM "ProductionOrder" WHERE status = 'IN_PROGRESS';
List all suppliers with their contact information.
SELECT name, code, phone, email, address FROM "Supplier" WHERE "isActive" = true;
Show production orders that are waiting for material.
SELECT "orderNumber", "plannedQuantity", "plannedStartDate" FROM "ProductionOrder" WHERE status = 'WAITING_MATERIAL';
What is the average unit price across all purchase order items?
SELECT AVG("unitPrice") FROM "PurchaseOrderItem";
List all employees with their hourly rates.
SELECT name, code, role, "hourlyRate" FROM "Employee" WHERE status = 'ACTIVE';
How many products are there for each product type?
SELECT "productType", COUNT(*) FROM "Product" GROUP BY "productType";
Show me all BOMs for the Mixing category.
SELECT b.name, pv.name AS product_name, b."outputQuantity" FROM "Bom" b JOIN "ProductVariant" pv ON b."productVariantId" = pv.id WHERE b.category = 'MIXING';
List all overdue purchase invoices.
SELECT "invoiceNumber", "dueDate", "totalAmount", "paidAmount" FROM "PurchaseInvoice" WHERE status = 'OVERDUE';
What is the total value of inventory in the Finished Goods warehouse?

SELECT SUM(i.quantity * COALESCE(i."averageCost", pv."standardCost", 0)) FROM "Inventory" i JOIN "ProductVariant" pv ON i."productVariantId" = pv.id JOIN "Location" l ON i."locationId" = l.id WHERE l.slug = 'fg_warehouse';
List sales orders that are ready to ship.
SELECT "orderNumber", c.name AS customer_name, "totalAmount" FROM "SalesOrder" so LEFT JOIN "Customer" c ON so."customerId" = c.id WHERE so.status = 'READY_TO_SHIP';
Show all machine downtime events from last week.
SELECT m.name AS machine, md.reason, md."startTime", md."endTime" FROM "MachineDowntime" md JOIN "Machine" m ON md."machineId" = m.id WHERE md."startTime" >= CURRENT_DATE - INTERVAL '7 days';
Which products have a reorder point set?
SELECT name, "skuCode", "reorderPoint", "reorderQuantity" FROM "ProductVariant" WHERE "reorderPoint" IS NOT NULL;
Total scrap quantity by production order.
SELECT po."orderNumber", SUM(sr.quantity) AS total_scrap FROM "ScrapRecord" sr JOIN "ProductionOrder" po ON sr."productionOrderId" = po.id GROUP BY po."orderNumber" ORDER BY total_scrap DESC;
List all accounts of type EXPENSE.
SELECT code, name, category FROM "Account" WHERE type = 'EXPENSE' AND "isActive" = true;
Show all goods receipts from today.

SELECT "receiptNumber", po."orderNumber" AS purchase_order, l.name AS location FROM "GoodsReceipt" gr JOIN "PurchaseOrder" po ON gr."purchaseOrderId" = po.id JOIN "Location" l ON gr."locationId" = l.id WHERE gr."receivedDate" >= CURRENT_DATE;
How many quality inspections failed last month?
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM "QualityInspection" WHERE result = 'FAIL' AND "inspectedAt" >= date_trunc('month', CURRENT_DATE - INTERVAL '1 month') AND "inspectedAt" < date_trunc('month', CURRENT_DATE);
List all active batches that are expiring this month.

SELECT "batchNumber", pv.name AS product, quantity, "expiryDate" FROM "Batch" b JOIN "ProductVariant" pv ON b."productVariantId" = pv.id WHERE b.status = 'ACTIVE' AND b."expiryDate" >= CURRENT_DATE AND b."expiryDate" < date_trunc('month', CURRENT_DATE) + INTERVAL '1 month';
Show me the sales order with the highest total amount.
SELECT "orderNumber", c.name AS customer, "totalAmount" FROM "SalesOrder" so LEFT JOIN "Customer" c ON so."customerId" = c.id ORDER BY "totalAmount" DESC NULLS LAST LIMIT 1;
List all journal entries that are still in draft status.
SELECT "entryNumber", "entryDate", description FROM "JournalEntry" WHERE status = 'DRAFT';
Total amount of purchase orders by supplier.
SELECT s.name AS supplier, SUM(po."totalAmount") AS total FROM "PurchaseOrder" po JOIN "Supplier" s ON po."supplierId" = s.id GROUP BY s.name ORDER BY total DESC;
Which production orders are linked to a sales order?
SELECT po."orderNumber" AS production_order, so."orderNumber" AS sales_order FROM "ProductionOrder" po JOIN "SalesOrder" so ON po."salesOrderId" = so.id;
List all users with their roles.
SELECT name, email, role FROM "User";
Show me the inventory levels for SKU ABC-001.

SELECT l.name AS location, i.quantity, i."averageCost" FROM "Inventory" i JOIN "ProductVariant" pv ON i."productVariantId" = pv.id JOIN "Location" l ON i."locationId" = l.id WHERE pv."skuCode" = 'ABC-001';
How many purchase requests are still open?
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM "PurchaseRequest" WHERE status = 'OPEN';
List all fixed assets that are fully depreciated.
SELECT "assetCode", name, category, "purchaseValue" FROM "FixedAsset" WHERE status = 'FULLY_DEPRECIATED';
Show all delivery orders that are pending.
SELECT do."orderNumber", so."orderNumber" AS sales_order, do."deliveryDate" FROM "DeliveryOrder" do JOIN "SalesOrder" so ON do."salesOrderId" = so.id WHERE do.status = 'PENDING';
What is the total debit and credit for account code 1000?

SELECT SUM(jl.debit) AS total_debit, SUM(jl.credit) AS total_credit FROM "JournalLine" jl JOIN "Account" a ON jl."accountId" = a.id JOIN "JournalEntry" je ON jl."journalEntryId" = je.id WHERE a.code = '1000' AND je.status = 'POSTED';
List all products that are WIP (Work in Progress).
SELECT pv.name, pv."skuCode" FROM "ProductVariant" pv JOIN "Product" p ON pv."productId" = p.id WHERE p."productType" = 'WIP';
Total quantity delivered per sales order.

SELECT so."orderNumber", SUM(doi.quantity) AS total_delivered FROM "DeliveryOrderItem" doi JOIN "DeliveryOrder" do ON doi."deliveryOrderId" = do.id JOIN "SalesOrder" so ON do."salesOrderId" = so.id GROUP BY so."orderNumber";
List customers who haven't placed any orders.
SELECT c.name, c.code FROM "Customer" c LEFT JOIN "SalesOrder" so ON c.id = so."customerId" WHERE so.id IS NULL;
Show me the BOM items for a specific BOM named 'Compound A'.

SELECT pv.name AS ingredient, bi.quantity, bi."scrapPercentage" FROM "BomItem" bi JOIN "ProductVariant" pv ON bi."productVariantId" = pv.id JOIN "Bom" b ON bi."bomId" = b.id WHERE b.name = 'Compound A';
Total budget for this year by account.
SELECT a.code, a.name, SUM(b.amount) AS total_budget FROM "Budget" b JOIN "Account" a ON b."accountId" = a.id WHERE b.year = EXTRACT(YEAR FROM CURRENT_DATE) GROUP BY a.code, a.name;
Which stock opnames are still open?
SELECT so.id, l.name AS location, so."createdAt" FROM "StockOpname" so JOIN "Location" l ON so."locationId" = l.id WHERE so.status = 'OPEN';
List all EXTRUDER machines.
SELECT name, code, status FROM "Machine" WHERE type = 'EXTRUDER';
Show the 5 most recent stock movements.
SELECT sm.type, pv.name AS product, sm.quantity, sm.reference, sm."createdAt" FROM "StockMovement" sm JOIN "ProductVariant" pv ON sm."productVariantId" = pv.id ORDER BY sm."createdAt" DESC LIMIT 5;
What is the current fiscal period?
SELECT name, "startDate", "endDate", status FROM "FiscalPeriod" WHERE status = 'OPEN' ORDER BY year DESC, month DESC LIMIT 1;
List all production executions for a specific machine code MIX-01.
SELECT pe."quantityProduced", pe."scrapQuantity", pe."startTime", pe."endTime" FROM "ProductionExecution" pe JOIN "Machine" m ON pe."machineId" = m.id WHERE m.code = 'MIX-01';
How many sales quotations have been accepted?
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM "SalesQuotation" WHERE status = 'ACCEPTED';
List all locations in the system.
SELECT name, slug, description FROM "Location";
Show me all invoices due this week.

SELECT "invoiceNumber", "dueDate", "totalAmount" - "paidAmount" AS remaining FROM "Invoice" WHERE "dueDate" >= CURRENT_DATE AND "dueDate" < CURRENT_DATE + INTERVAL '7 days' AND status NOT IN ('PAID', 'CANCELLED');
Total quantity of goods received per supplier.

SELECT s.name AS supplier, SUM(gri."receivedQty") AS total_received FROM "GoodsReceiptItem" gri JOIN "GoodsReceipt" gr ON gri."goodsReceiptId" = gr.id JOIN "PurchaseOrder" po ON gr."purchaseOrderId" = po.id JOIN "Supplier" s ON po."supplierId" = s.id GROUP BY s.name;
List all work shifts.
SELECT name, "startTime", "endTime", status FROM "WorkShift";
Which products have the weighted average costing method?
SELECT name, "skuCode", "standardCost" FROM "ProductVariant" WHERE "costingMethod" = 'WEIGHTED_AVERAGE';
Show me sales orders by order type.
SELECT "orderType", COUNT(*) FROM "SalesOrder" GROUP BY "orderType";
List all purchase orders that are partially received.
SELECT "orderNumber", s.name AS supplier, "expectedDate" FROM "PurchaseOrder" po JOIN "Supplier" s ON po."supplierId" = s.id WHERE po.status = 'PARTIAL_RECEIVED';
What is the total paid amount for purchase invoices this month?
SELECT SUM("paidAmount") FROM "PurchaseInvoice" WHERE "invoiceDate" >= date_trunc('month', CURRENT_DATE);
List all child production orders for a parent order.
SELECT child."orderNumber", child.status, child."plannedQuantity" FROM "ProductionOrder" child WHERE child."parentOrderId" = (SELECT id FROM "ProductionOrder" WHERE "orderNumber" = 'WO-PARENT-001');
Show me all cash accounts.
SELECT code, name FROM "Account" WHERE "isCashAccount" = true AND "isActive" = true;
Total material issued per production order.
SELECT po."orderNumber", SUM(mi.quantity) AS total_issued FROM "MaterialIssue" mi JOIN "ProductionOrder" po ON mi."productionOrderId" = po.id GROUP BY po."orderNumber";
Which customers have a payment term of more than 30 days?
SELECT name, code, "paymentTermDays" FROM "Customer" WHERE "paymentTermDays" > 30;
List all product variants with their sell price.
SELECT name, "skuCode", "sellPrice" FROM "ProductVariant" WHERE "sellPrice" IS NOT NULL ORDER BY "sellPrice" DESC;
Show me all audit logs from today.

SELECT u.name AS user_name, al.action, al."entityType", al."entityId", al."createdAt" FROM "AuditLog" al JOIN "User" u ON al."userId" = u.id WHERE al."createdAt" >= CURRENT_DATE ORDER BY al."createdAt" DESC;
How many products are in each location?
SELECT l.name AS location, COUNT(DISTINCT i."productVariantId") AS product_count FROM "Inventory" i JOIN "Location" l ON i."locationId" = l.id WHERE i.quantity > 0 GROUP BY l.name;
List all production issues that are still open.
SELECT pi.category, pi.description, po."orderNumber" FROM "ProductionIssue" pi JOIN "ProductionOrder" po ON pi."productionOrderId" = po.id WHERE pi.status = 'OPEN';
Show the total sales amount by customer.

SELECT c.name, SUM(so."totalAmount") AS total_sales FROM "SalesOrder" so JOIN "Customer" c ON so."customerId" = c.id WHERE so.status NOT IN ('DRAFT', 'CANCELLED') GROUP BY c.name ORDER BY total_sales DESC;
List all products that need to be reordered.

SELECT pv.name, pv."skuCode", i.quantity, pv."reorderPoint" FROM "Inventory" i JOIN "ProductVariant" pv ON i."productVariantId" = pv.id WHERE pv."reorderPoint" IS NOT NULL AND i.quantity < pv."reorderPoint";
Total payment received for sales invoices this quarter.
SELECT SUM("paidAmount") FROM "Invoice" WHERE "invoiceDate" >= date_trunc('quarter', CURRENT_DATE);
Show all production orders by status with counts.
SELECT status, COUNT(*) FROM "ProductionOrder" GROUP BY status ORDER BY COUNT(*) DESC;
List all suppliers who provide a specific product SKU.

SELECT s.name AS supplier, sp."unitPrice", sp."leadTimeDays" FROM "SupplierProduct" sp JOIN "Supplier" s ON sp."supplierId" = s.id JOIN "ProductVariant" pv ON sp."productVariantId" = pv.id WHERE pv."skuCode" = 'RAW-001';
What is the average output quantity per production shift?
SELECT AVG("outputQuantity") FROM "ProductionShift" WHERE "outputQuantity" IS NOT NULL;
Show me all reserved stock.

SELECT pv.name AS product, l.name AS location, sr.quantity, sr."reservedFor", sr.status FROM "StockReservation" sr JOIN "ProductVariant" pv ON sr."productVariantId" = pv.id JOIN "Location" l ON sr."locationId" = l.id WHERE sr.status = 'ACTIVE';
List sales quotations expiring this month.

SELECT "quotationNumber", c.name AS customer, "totalAmount", "validUntil" FROM "SalesQuotation" sq LEFT JOIN "Customer" c ON sq."customerId" = c.id WHERE sq.status = 'SENT' AND sq."validUntil" < date_trunc('month', CURRENT_DATE) + INTERVAL '1 month';
What is the total cost per hour for all active machines?
SELECT SUM("costPerHour") FROM "Machine" WHERE status = 'ACTIVE';
Show purchase request items for a specific request number.

SELECT pv.name AS product, pri.quantity FROM "PurchaseRequestItem" pri JOIN "PurchaseRequest" pr ON pri."purchaseRequestId" = pr.id JOIN "ProductVariant" pv ON pri."productVariantId" = pv.id WHERE pr."requestNumber" = 'PR-001';
List all stock adjustments made this week.

SELECT pv.name AS product, sm.quantity, sm.reference, sm."createdAt" FROM "StockMovement" sm JOIN "ProductVariant" pv ON sm."productVariantId" = pv.id WHERE sm.type = 'ADJUSTMENT' AND sm."createdAt" >= CURRENT_DATE - INTERVAL '7 days';
Which accounts have budgets exceeding 10 million for any month?
SELECT a.code, a.name, b.year, b.month, b.amount FROM "Budget" b JOIN "Account" a ON b."accountId" = a.id WHERE b.amount > 10000000;
Show me sales order items for order SO-001.

SELECT pv.name AS product, soi.quantity, soi."unitPrice", soi.subtotal FROM "SalesOrderItem" soi JOIN "SalesOrder" so ON soi."salesOrderId" = so.id JOIN "ProductVariant" pv ON soi."productVariantId" = pv.id WHERE so."orderNumber" = 'SO-001';
Total quantity of each product type in all inventories.
SELECT p."productType", SUM(i.quantity) AS total_qty FROM "Inventory" i JOIN "ProductVariant" pv ON i."productVariantId" = pv.id JOIN "Product" p ON pv."productId" = p.id GROUP BY p."productType";
List all manual journal entries.
SELECT "entryNumber", "entryDate", description, status FROM "JournalEntry" WHERE "isAutoGenerated" = false;
Which employees worked as operators on production shifts?
SELECT DISTINCT e.name, e.code FROM "Employee" e JOIN "ProductionShift" ps ON e.id = ps."operatorId";
Show me all cancelled sales orders.
SELECT "orderNumber", c.name AS customer, "totalAmount", "createdAt" FROM "SalesOrder" so LEFT JOIN "Customer" c ON so."customerId" = c.id WHERE so.status = 'CANCELLED';
What is the total value of outstanding invoices?
SELECT SUM("totalAmount" - "paidAmount") AS outstanding FROM "Invoice" WHERE status NOT IN ('PAID', 'CANCELLED');
List all production orders created by a specific user.
SELECT po."orderNumber", po.status, po."plannedQuantity" FROM "ProductionOrder" po JOIN "User" u ON po."createdById" = u.id WHERE u.email = 'admin@polyflow.com';
Show me the stock movement history for a specific product.

SELECT sm.type, sm.quantity, l_from.name AS from_location, l_to.name AS to_location, sm.reference, sm."createdAt" FROM "StockMovement" sm JOIN "ProductVariant" pv ON sm."productVariantId" = pv.id LEFT JOIN "Location" l_from ON sm."fromLocationId" = l_from.id LEFT JOIN "Location" l_to ON sm."toLocationId" = l_to.id WHERE pv."skuCode" = 'FG-001' ORDER BY sm."createdAt" DESC;
Which purchase orders have not been invoiced yet?

SELECT po."orderNumber", s.name AS supplier, po."totalAmount" FROM "PurchaseOrder" po JOIN "Supplier" s ON po."supplierId" = s.id LEFT JOIN "PurchaseInvoice" pi ON po.id = pi."purchaseOrderId" WHERE pi.id IS NULL AND po.status IN ('RECEIVED', 'PARTIAL_RECEIVED');
List all products with their preferred suppliers.
SELECT pv.name AS product, pv."skuCode", s.name AS preferred_supplier FROM "ProductVariant" pv JOIN "Supplier" s ON pv."preferredSupplierId" = s.id;
Show me the production yield rate.

SELECT po."orderNumber", po."plannedQuantity", po."actualQuantity", ROUND((po."actualQuantity"::numeric / NULLIF(po."plannedQuantity"::numeric, 0)) * 100, 2) AS yield_percent FROM "ProductionOrder" po WHERE po.status = 'COMPLETED';
How many deliveries were made last month?
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM "DeliveryOrder" WHERE status = 'DELIVERED' AND "deliveryDate" >= date_trunc('month', CURRENT_DATE - INTERVAL '1 month') AND "deliveryDate" < date_trunc('month', CURRENT_DATE);
List all products with their standard cost.
SELECT name, "skuCode", "standardCost" FROM "ProductVariant" WHERE "standardCost" IS NOT NULL ORDER BY "standardCost" DESC;
Show me all stock transfers between locations.

SELECT pv.name AS product, sm.quantity, l_from.name AS from_loc, l_to.name AS to_loc, sm."createdAt" FROM "StockMovement" sm JOIN "ProductVariant" pv ON sm."productVariantId" = pv.id JOIN "Location" l_from ON sm."fromLocationId" = l_from.id JOIN "Location" l_to ON sm."toLocationId" = l_to.id WHERE sm.type = 'TRANSFER' ORDER BY sm."createdAt" DESC;
What is the breakdown of accounts by type?
SELECT type, COUNT(*) FROM "Account" WHERE "isActive" = true GROUP BY type;
List all batches in quarantine status.

SELECT "batchNumber", pv.name AS product, quantity, l.name AS location FROM "Batch" b JOIN "ProductVariant" pv ON b."productVariantId" = pv.id JOIN "Location" l ON b."locationId" = l.id WHERE b.status = 'QUARANTINE';
Show me all production issues by category.
SELECT category, COUNT(*) FROM "ProductionIssue" GROUP BY category ORDER BY COUNT(*) DESC;
What is the total amount of all confirmed sales orders?
SELECT SUM("totalAmount") FROM "SalesOrder" WHERE status = 'CONFIRMED';
List all roles and their permissions.
SELECT role, resource, "canAccess" FROM "RolePermission" ORDER BY role, resource;
Show me the discrepancy from the last stock opname.

SELECT pv.name AS product, soi."systemQuantity", soi."countedQuantity", (soi."countedQuantity" - soi."systemQuantity") AS difference FROM "StockOpnameItem" soi JOIN "ProductVariant" pv ON soi."productVariantId" = pv.id WHERE soi."opnameId" = (SELECT id FROM "StockOpname" WHERE status = 'COMPLETED' ORDER BY "completedAt" DESC LIMIT 1) AND soi."countedQuantity" != soi."systemQuantity";
Average lead time for all suppliers.
SELECT AVG("paymentTermDays") FROM "Supplier" WHERE "isActive" = true;
List all MIXER type machines with their locations.
SELECT m.name, m.code, l.name AS location FROM "Machine" m JOIN "Location" l ON m."locationId" = l.id WHERE m.type = 'MIXER';
Show me all completed production orders from this week.
SELECT "orderNumber", "actualQuantity", "actualEndDate" FROM "ProductionOrder" WHERE status = 'COMPLETED' AND "actualEndDate" >= CURRENT_DATE - INTERVAL '7 days';
Which sales invoices are overdue?
SELECT "invoiceNumber", "dueDate", "totalAmount" - "paidAmount" AS remaining FROM "Invoice" WHERE status != 'PAID' AND "dueDate" < CURRENT_DATE;
Total sales by month for this year.

SELECT EXTRACT(MONTH FROM "orderDate") AS month, SUM("totalAmount") AS total FROM "SalesOrder" WHERE EXTRACT(YEAR FROM "orderDate") = EXTRACT(YEAR FROM CURRENT_DATE) AND status NOT IN ('DRAFT', 'CANCELLED') GROUP BY month ORDER BY month;
List all posted journal entries for this fiscal period.

SELECT je."entryNumber", je."entryDate", je.description FROM "JournalEntry" je WHERE je.status = 'POSTED' AND je."entryDate" >= (SELECT "startDate" FROM "FiscalPeriod" WHERE status = 'OPEN' LIMIT 1) AND je."entryDate" <= (SELECT "endDate" FROM "FiscalPeriod" WHERE status = 'OPEN' LIMIT 1);
